column3: Sorry for not catching this while reviewing pre-merge, but should this URL be https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/list?q=bitcoin-core&can=1 (open issues + closed issues) instead of https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/list?q=bitcoin-core (open issues)? :)
There is a drop-down where you can select all issues
